reviewText: I have always been a fa of Il Divo. Their voices are just superb. The setting in London was really a great choice. Carlos's sexual innuendo's are getting a bit old though.
Title: Live In London

reviewText: my mom loves this crap I don't even know what the hell divo is?? A dumpt ruck??? keep writing so i can be
Title: Live In London

reviewText: I was very satisfied with my purchase. Love the video. I would recommend this video to others. Love Il Divo.
Title: Live In London

reviewText: It's so great to see the four men singing so beautifully together and getting proper appreciation from a large crowd.
Title: Live In London

reviewText: Fantastic singing as usual. I have all of Il Divo's dvds and cds. I really enjoy and love hearing these four talented young men sing.
Title: Live In London

reviewText: What can I say about perfection?  The blend of these voices makes you think of a heavenly choir.  Of course the view is not bad either!  Love it - love it.
Title: Live In London

reviewText: this was a gift but there satisfaction seemed to se good I must say non of us will never know how people think of gifts
Title: Live In London

reviewText: I love Il Divo!  I was fortunate to see them in Baltimore.  They have great rapport and harmony.  This production was A-One!
Title: Live In London

reviewText: I really enjoyed this a lot, the men are all so talented. The music is crisp and the lighting done well. This is a must purchase.
Title: Live In London

reviewText: Have collected everything I can that Il Divo has released.  Have been waiting for this to be release since I saw and heard sample.  This is one of the best they have done to date.  I have copy for me and ordered 4 more as gifts for my friends and relatives.  You can not miss this one!  Amazon UK was great getting it for me since not released in USA yet.
summary: The Best of Il Divo yet
Title: Live In London

reviewText: Very disappointing video quality.  This is not live video recording - rather it is a poor flim transfer and the grain is as big as golf balls.  Buy the regular DVD instead.
Title: Live In London

reviewText: They are the best there is.  Did not wont the singing to come to an end.  Looking forward to their next DVD.
Title: Live In London

reviewText: I thought most of the music was wonderful, didn't appreciate some of the banter with the audience.  Their voices are powerful and beautiful.
Title: Live In London

reviewText: Music OK. Poor stage presence on a 65 inch screen. Performances not as good as recordings. Michael Buble Caught in the Act - Neil Diamond at Madison Square Garden these make you feel like your right at the concert. Il Divo lacking.
Title: Live In London

reviewText: IL DIVO IS THRILLING TO LISTEN TO.  THEIR VOICES RESOUND.  THEY ARE ALL BUT ONE OPERA TRAINED.  THEIR VERSION OF AMAZING GRACE BRINGS GOOSE BUMPS.
Title: Live In London

reviewText: We may not be able to go to London for an Il Divo concert, but we can bring London and Il Divo into our home, sit back, pretend we are there, and take a break without missing a beat. Production values are great. The additional interviews with how the selections were made offered another important insight into how these selected the songs and how the songs appealed to them and then to us.
Title: Live In London
